title: The Island of 72 Degrees
description: At one point or another in life we all have struggles to face. But how are you choosing to see and respond to each one? What's the meaning behind these inevitable moments? And what's really happening to you? The Island of 72 Degrees is a fable that inspires us to rethink these moments and not let a perfectly good crisis go to waste. Themes: Perspective, insight, crisis management, appreciation, gratitude, seeing beyond your challenge, making the most of life's tougher situations.
author: Howard Brodwin Nathanael Lark Jason Wolf
